text: Juan Hormaechea Cazón (5 June 1939 - 1 December 2020) was a Spanish politician. He was the President of Cantabria between 1987 and 1990, and again from 1991 to 1995. He was also Mayor of Santander between 1977 and 1987. He was born in Santander. Hormaechea died on 1 December 2020 in Santander at the age of 81.Muere a los 81 años Juan Hormaechea, presidente de Cantabria entre 1987 y 1995 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of Cantabria Category:Spanish mayors
title: Juan Hormaechea
